subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kyrie Irving recorded his first career triple-double, with 21 points, 12 assists and 10 rebounds, and led the Cleveland Cavaliers to a 99-79 win at home over the Utah Jazz.
snippet: Kyrie Irving recorded his first career triple-double, with 21 points, 12 assists and 10 rebounds, and led the Cleveland Cavaliers to a 99-79 win at home over the Utah Jazz.
